creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
markings: 弦七十二品 {Tsuru nanajūni hin} [Seal no. 29]
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
portfolio: Full-length Portraits Series VI Six Figures of the Stage 第六期全身図シリーズ・舞台六姿
text: 97th design by Kōkei. Actor Bandō Tamasaburō V (b. 1950) as Ochika おちか in the play The Living Koheiji (Ikiteiru Koheiji 生きてゐる小平次), performed at the Kabuki Theater in June of 1987. Koheiji, Takuro, and Ochika are traveling performers. Koheiji is in love with Ochika, the wife of Takuro, and he demands Takuro to give her up.
title: Actor Bandō Tamasaburō V as Ochika
